name: One Punch - LIMITED EDITION
description:
■ One Punch LIMITED EDITION Benefits
• Striking Sensation
• [Trainer] ($2.99 cash item) included.
• [Unlimited Champ Challenge Tickets] ($4.99 cash item) included.

▶ Real-time PvP with your friends!
• Surpass your physical limits!
• Become the greatest One Punch champion!
• Show your skills in various punch competitions!

Destroy an infinite number of punching bags with your fists and skills!
Have fun destroying the punch bags, but be careful of defeat!
